name: PMMP5Converter
author: VsrStudio
description: Convert PocketMine plugins to API 5 using PMMP5Converter.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update && apt install -y git php-cli
mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins /mnt/server/converted-plugins
cd /mnt/server
git clone https://github.com/Wertzui123/PMMP5Converter.git
